abstract: If Mitt Romney thinks Rick Perry remains his biggest threat, he might want to think twice about attacking him, because that only risks helping Mr. Perry position himself as the Republicans' best alternative.
snippet: If Mitt Romney thinks Rick Perry remains his biggest threat, he might want to think twice about attacking him, because that only risks helping Mr. Perry position himself as the Republicans' best alternative.
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney has run a smooth, low-drama campaign so far, but its aggressive posture toward Rick Perry within the past week leaves me wondering about his strategic choices.
